about.contentEn: Change duo Studio is a Taiwan design group, founded on the ideas that design form can serve algrothim,media, space, and activites inspiring surroundings and arising a positive effect on people’s lives.</br>Led by a couple of owners, studio work can be founded homes—often for creative production, web site,art collectors—to academic, cultural and civic projects
about.contentTw: 澄之朵工作室是台灣的設計團體，致力於透過演算法、多媒體、空間、活動策略來改善並活化人們的生活與環境。</br>由蕭澄之、黃瑋婕主持，工作室的工作項目含括平面設計、網頁設計、空間設計、並展現出對當代藝術觀點、演算技術與文化涵構的關懷。

about.contentEn: Change Hsiao is graduated form Department Architecture of TamKang Universitey as the doctor of philosophy degree.</br> His research field foucus upon algrothim, media, space, and activitesfor creative production, web site, art collectors—to academic, cultural and civic projects
about.contentTw: 現任澄之朵工作室設計總監。</br>淡江大學建築系助理教授。</br>專長為代理人演算法、多媒體、網頁架設、空間設計。</br>

about.contentEn: Change duo Studio is a Taiwan design group, founded on the ideas that design form can serve algrothim, media, space, and activites inspiring surroundings and arising a positive effect on people’s lives.</br>Led by a couple of owners, studio work can be founded homes—often for creative production, web site, art collectors—to academic, cultural and civic projects
about.contentTw: 現任澄之朵工作室執行長。</br>台中市客家委員會藝術顧問。</br>專長為活動企劃、音樂創作、舞蹈編排。</br>

contact.contentTw: 商用平面、視覺傳達設計、周邊創意產品製作。

contact.contentEn: Architecture, Interior, BIM Model, Drawing, Construction, Design
contact.contentTw: 建築、室內空間、表現渲染圖、BIM、製作、設計、施工。
